description: 'Fuck your boss' That's what Tamas Eszterhazy's note says. Hmmm, but how does he get this notion in motion? Things work out perfectly when his foreman Mark Slade complains that his ole lady really sucks at sucking dick. With a sly twinkle in his eye, Tamas eagerly volunteers to show Mark how to suck cock and even eat ass, climaxing with the big boss fucking his laborer's ass and both of them happy with a job well done.
title: Brawlers, Scene #03
